title: AMD Ryzen 9 7950X3D beats out Core i9-13900K in leaked reviewer's guide
description: AMD Ryzen 9 7950X3D is faster than the Core i9-13900K, based on leaked review guide from AMD.

title: Google TV is getting a free update that makes it easier to find what you want
description: New pages that let viewers browse movies, TV shows, and more from apps they already subscribe to have been added to the Google TV smart interface.

title: Latest Garmin Forerunner 965 leak shows off redesigned map and system UI
description: Garmin runners will be able to more easily follow directions at a glance although many features remain a mystery.

title: Microsoft tells Exchange admins to remove some previous antivirus restrictions
description: restrictions are no longer necessary, and could even hinder the AV's ability to spot malware, Microsoft says.

title: Americans lost $8.8 billion to cyber scams in 2022
description: Scammers seem to be getting braver with their fraudulent activity, and it's landing them bigger rewards.

title: Microsoft Defender will soon be a lot better at stopping corporate cyberattacks
description: Updates for Microsoft Defender should help minimize any damage done by a ransomware attack.

title: Motorola is bringing iPhone-beating satellite messaging to your Android phone
description: Motorola's new smartphone and Bluetooth add-on will mean non-iPhone 14 users can rely on satellite messaging.

title: A fierce Cocaine Bear debate is raging about whether the comedy-horror movie is good or not
description: Cocaine Bear has roared into theaters – but viewers can't agree if the comedy-horror film is worth watching.

title: Signal could quit the UK amid Online Safety Bill row
description: Top private messaging app Signal says it would rather shut its UK operations than undermine or weaken its privacy policies to comply with the new law.

title: Google Drive is finally making it easier to share, download, and delete multiple files at once
description: Finding files in Google Drive should soon get easier thanks to new sort options.

title: Nearly all firms have some kind of cloud misconfiguration issue
description: Businesses aren’t giving their cloud services the careful consideration they need, exposing sensitive company info, new report claims.

title: Mortal Kombat 12 gets announced in the worst way possible
description: After years of radio silence, Mortal Kombat 12 has finally been officially confirmed by its publisher but not in the best way.

title: 7 new movies and TV shows on Netflix, Prime Video, Disney Plus and more this weekend (February 24)
description: From new TV thrillers to returning fan favorites, here are the best films and TV series to stream this weekend.

title: Adobe could face legal action over $20bn Figma deal
description: Department of Justice may try to block Adobe-Figma deal, insiders say.

title: Netflix slashes prices in over 30 countries, but it won't help the password sharing woes
description: Streaming giant reduces subscription fees up to 50% in attempt to attract more subscribers.

title: Fruit shortages could be on the way following Dole ransomware attack
description: A ransomware attack against Dole forced the food giant to suspend some of its operations, it was found.

title: The iPhone 15 Pro could tempt you with a stunning new special edition color
description: Rumors are predicting that the iPhone 15 Pro will come in a new special edition 'dark red' color. But where could that leave Product Red?

title: Deepfake fraud attacks are hitting more and more businesses
description: Businesses are getting warier of deepfake attacks and digital injection attacks.

title: European Commission bans TikTok on staff devices
description: The order comes amid continued allegations that TikTok parent ByteDance is harvesting user data for the Chinese government.

title: Intel claims its 3nm CPUs are not delayed, will land in 2024
description: Arrow Lake is still on track for its 2024 launch, says Intel CEO - rumors stating otherwise are “patently false”.

title: Deactivate Facebook and Instagram searches explode after subscriptions plans revealed
description: Users rush to deactivate Facebook and Instagram after subscription news.

title: Your Google Docs files are about to get a whole lot smarter and better-looking
description: A bunch of new features and a more modern look are coming to Google Docs.

title: The Lord of the Rings: Gollum trailers, gameplay and news
description: The Lord of the Rings: Gollum has been in the works for a few years now. Here’s everything we know about the upcoming adventure game from Daedalic Entertainment.

title: Pirated copies of Final Cut Pro were riddled with Mac malware
description: pirated Final Cut Pro software found carrying the XMRig cryptominer.

title: Many workers think their employers aren't investing in technology properly
description: Ricoh Europe finds businesses are still investing in tools, just not the right ones, and workers are beginning to get frustrated.

title: Marvel's Thunderbolts casts a big Invincible star – and he'd be perfect for one role
description: Marvel has reportedly hired a major Invincible TV show star for its forthcoming Thunderbolts movie.

title: Quordle today - hints and answers for Friday, February 24 (game #396)
description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

title: Your Galaxy S23 might be powerful enough to quickly generate AI images
description: The next frontier for generative AI technology may be in your pocket right now.

title: The Apple Watch is still a long way from its health-tracking holy grail
description: Don't expect the Apple Watch's rumored blood glucose monitoring system to land anytime soon.
